item.name: US  2906 | TC#4 | Validar actualizar un producto existente

exec: pm.test("El producto actualizado debería mostrar los nuevos detalles", function () {
pm.expect(jsonData.title).to.eql("KingSpec 1TB 2.5-inch SATA SSD, SATA III 6Gb/s Internal Solid State Drive - 3D NAND Flash TLC, for Desktop, Laptop, All-in-One (P3,1TB)");

pm.expect(jsonData.description).to.include("KingSpec SATA SSD with read speeds of up to 550 MB/s, fast for booting, loading, and transferring data. Reliability and stability: The SATA SSD adopts 3D NAND TLC, with a mean time between failures (MTBF) of up to 1 million hours. Shock-resistant, vibration-resistant, and reduces noise interference.");
